title: Bright and beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath! Don't wait to call us home!
posting_body: ['Residences on Bedford', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 921 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2190 - $2341', '(203) 208-3262', 'Community Description', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Providing the convenience of an apartment and the comfort of a home, The Residences on Bedford in Stamford, Connecticut offers a variety of recently renovated apartment homes, many with spectacular views of Long Island Sound.', 'Shopping, entertainment and dining are conveniently located just minutes away.', 'Amenities include an elegant club room, swimming pool with nearby gas grills, free Wi-Fi access in common areas, garages, laundry facilities on every floor, a pool, abundant closet space, and much more.', 'Come see why The Residences on Bedford is just the place for downtown living!', 'Community Amenities', '✓ 24 Hour Convenience Store', '✓ Bowling Alley', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Gas Grills', '✓ On-Site Park', '✓ Parks Nearby', '✓ Pet Friendly', '✓ Play Area', '✓ Pool', '✓ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '✓ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '✓ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '✓ Elegant Clubroom', '✓ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '✓ Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '✓ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '✓ Near Downtown Stamford', '✓ Online Payments Available', 'Unit Features', '✓ Abundant Closet Space', '✓ All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '✓ Black Appliances', '✓ Blinds', '✓ Garage', '✓ Heating', '✓ Large, Private Balconies', '✓ Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '✓ Storage Units', '✓ Updated Interior Finishes', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', '(203) 208-3262', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Management Company:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '86651A15027045D']
